objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Historical lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about food and dining out using slang register
Students create original historical themed content about food and dining out in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Historical story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using slang register in historical context
Character B: Responding in slang register within historical theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with tradition
food and dining out with heritage
food and dining out with legacy

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
